net.bryansaunders.jee6divelog.beans

Class LoginBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bryansaunders.jee6divelog.beans.LoginBean

  • @Named(value="loginBean")
@RequestScoped
public class LoginBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Backing Bean for Login Page. Name: loginBean, Scope: Request
    Author:
    Bryan Saunders
